name: SKVideoNode
desc: A graphical element that plays video content.

items.name: init(avPlayer: AVPlayer)
items.desc: Initializes a video node using an existing AVPlayer object.

items.name: init(fileNamed: String)
items.desc: Initializes a video node using a video file stored in the app bundle.

items.name: init(url: URL)
items.desc: Initializes a video node using a URL.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Tells you when to initialize a video node that was created from an archive.

items.name: var anchorPoint: CGPoint
items.desc: The point in the sprite that corresponds to the nodeâ€™s position.

items.name: var size: CGSize
items.desc: The dimensions of the video node, in points.
